text: <!channel>: I'm not sure who is the correct person to reach out to. I was just approached by a conference organizer who asked to get a representative from hyperledger to speak at his conference. Who might that be? Its called Distributed Trade its June 14th in St Louis <https://godistributed.com/trade/>   The focus is on blockchain applications in financial services and trade networks (supply chain mgmt, inventory auditing, cross-border payments, etc

attachments.title: Distributed: Trade - Blockchain for Trade Networks & Financial Services
attachments.text: The weekly blockchain technology report covering enterprise-level blockchain applications: financial services, global trade, healthcare, identity, and more.
attachments.fallback: Distributed: Distributed: Trade - Blockchain for Trade Networks & Financial Services
